EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015 is TOMORROW! Your ticket and final information!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
We are very excited to say that our biggest event for National Citizen Service graduates finally just around the corner. This is going to be a fantastic day full of opportunities for you to get back together with other NCS graduates, and have exclusive access to a range of workshops, stalls and professionals.
Please click here to get your ticket and bring a printed copy with you to the event to gain exclusive access to a range of workshops, stalls and networking events!
We do currently have a few spaces left so if you do have an NCS friend who hasn't signed up - do bring them along tomorrow!
What to Bring
A copy of your CV and/or cover letter We have a huge range of professionals attending who can give you 1-2-1 feedback and advice throughout the event!
A pen and paper - you will take part in a range of workshops and there will be a lot information that you will want to remember!
Do ensure that you come dressed professionally. You never know who you are going to meet during the day, and first impressions count!
Bring a packed lunch as you will not be able to leave site once the event has started. Light refreshments will be provided
If you do have any questions please call Kay on 07785618491.
See you at 12:00 tomorrow at UCA Epsom!
Christmas Present Appeal
This Saturday we are partnering with Epsom and Ewell Foodbank. They work incredibly hard to support families in need and this year we want to help them ensure every child gets a gift this Christmas.
If possible please do bring along a small present to give to a child this Christmas. This could be anything from a book, teddy bear to a boardgame. Please do remember to put the age and gender the present is for on the wrapping paper!
Competition Time!
Win an Ipad Mini!
We want to give every NCS graduate the opportunity to be involved in Ignite - but we need your help! We need you to get online, into your school, back in touch with your wave and telling everyone about why they should also come down to Ignite!
The person who gets the most NCS graduates to sign up and attend on the day will win an IPad Mini! Winner!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Kay at kay.obibi@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge Society team!
